title: The Complete Works of Nathaniel Hawthorne
description:
Nathaniel Hawthorne is a literary giant of American literature, whose works have gone on to inspire many other great writers. This eBook offers readers the unique opportunity of exploring the prolific writerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s work, as well as an assortment of bonus texts.
